quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Ensuring the physical security of the Chu'unthor II and its inhabitants against all threats, internal and external.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Organizing security patrols, assessing defensive vulnerabilities, training volunteer militia.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC031: Coordinates closely with Captain Thorne on ship defense.
critical_relationship_highlights.PC001: Respects Wes's Mandalorian combat skills, may assign him to security details.

temporary_conditions_effects.effects_summary_gm: Always alert, perhaps a bit jumpy or overly cautious in assessing threats.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Security Chief Torvin Kress.

appearance_details.summary: A Jedi Knight with a lean, hard build honed by years of training and vigilance. His dark hair is cut short and practical. His eyes are sharp and constantly assessing, reflecting a mind always considering threat vectors. He often wears more durable, reinforced Jedi attire suitable for security work, and his lightsaber is always within easy reach.

distinguishing_features.feature: A network of old, faded scars on his forearms, results of rigorous sparring or past conflicts.
He rarely smiles, his default expression one of focused seriousness.

appearance_details.attire_style: Reinforced Jedi tunics and trousers, sturdy boots. Sometimes wears light armor plating over his robes during high alert.
appearance_details.voice_description: Clear, firm, and concise. Gives orders with an expectation of immediate compliance.

role_occupation.title: Head of Shipboard Security / Militia Coordinator
role_occupation.description: Altisian Jedi Knight with a Guardian/Sentinel focus. Responsible for internal security, managing ship defenses, and training a volunteer militia.

background_story.summary: Torvin Kress always gravitated towards the protective aspects of the Jedi Order. He served as a Temple Guard on Coruscant for a time before becoming disillusioned with the Senate's influence and the Council's perceived passivity in the face of growing darkness. He found the Altisians' more proactive community defense appealing. He excels in small-unit tactics and defensive strategies. Order 66 has only hardened his resolve to protect what remains of the Jedi.
background_story.origin: Corulag (A world known for its military academies and disciplined populace)

key_events.description: Gained experience in security and defensive protocols.
Sought a more proactive role in protecting Jedi communities.

personality.summary: Knight Kress is vigilant, disciplined, and highly tactical. The current crisis has lent a grim focus to his already serious demeanor. He is fair in his dealings but demands competence and readiness from those under his command (including any volunteer militia). He is not given to idle chatter and prioritizes the physical security of the *Chu'unthor II* above all else. He has a deep respect for genuine combat skill and pragmatism, which might lead him to appreciate Wes's Mandalorian background.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Overly Cautious / Can seem Unapproachable or Harsh
quirks_mannerisms: Constantly scanning his surroundings, even in 'safe' areas.
His hand often rests near his lightsaber hilt.
Speaks in short, direct sentences.
fears: Failing to protect the innocent aboard
personality.moral_compass: Lawful Good/Lawful Neutral. Duty and protection are paramount. Will make hard choices to ensure the safety of the majority.

Starship Defensive Systems (Basic Unders.notes: Understands ship's shield and weapon capabilities to coordinate with the bridge.

Lightsaber Combat (Guardian Focus).specialization: Possibly Soresu or Shien for defense and interception.

Force Abilities (Protective/Sensing).specialization: Force Shield, Sense Danger, perhaps abilities to stun or incapacitate threats non-lethally.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Firm, concise, direct, professional.

PC001.status_summary: Subordinate (if Wes joins security details), respects his combat pragmatism.

NPC031.status_summary: Coordinates ship defense strategies with Captain Thorne.

primary_driver.driver: Protecting the Altisian community and the Chu'unthor II from all threats.

immediate_goal.goal: Bolster ship defenses, train militia, identify and neutralize any immediate security risks.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: Help secure a permanent, defensible sanctuary for the Altisians.

current_state_location.status_descriptor: Constantly on alert, managing security operations.
current_state_location.location_name: Security Center / Patrolling key ship sections
current_state_location.last_known_activity: Organizing security and training volunteer militia.

inventory_equipment_notable.item_name: Lightsaber (Practical Hilt, perhaps Yellow or Orange Blade - Sentinel/Guardian colors)
inventory_equipment_notable.description: A Jedi Knight's lightsaber, well-maintained and always ready.
A backup ranged weapon, common for security personnel.
Direct line to security teams and command.
Contains ship security layouts, patrol routes, militia rosters, and threat assessments.

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: Aware of specific, unconfirmed security vulnerabilities within the Chu'unthor II that he's trying to mitigate without causing alarm.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: An actual breach or direct, trusted inquiry from leadership.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could highlight critical weaknesses or rally support for his measures.

potential_plot_hooks_involving_npc: Investigating a suspected internal threat or saboteur
Leading a defense against boarders
Needing PCs for a high-risk security operation
His strict methods clashing with the more relaxed Altisian community norms
gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Learning to balance vigilance with trust, or adapting his traditional security mindset to the unconventional threats they now face.
ai_behavioral_prompts_gm: Portray as serious, focused, and always assessing potential threats.
His dialogue is concise and prioritizes security concerns.
Respects competence and discipline.

titles_honorifics.context_of_use: Used by crew when referring to her role

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Protecting the Chu'unthor II by managing its electronic signature and gathering vital (if scarce) intelligence, driven by gratitude to the Altisians.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Monitoring for Imperial transmissions, attempting to decrypt any useful information, maintaining comm silence protocols.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC012: Works closely with Master Vantos on intel analysis.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC003: Assists Master Davion with secure comms for Wes's clan contact attempts.

temporary_conditions_effects.effects_summary_gm: Can be jumpy, occasionally speaks in rapid bursts of technical jargon, highly reliant on stim-caf.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Communications Lead Elara Vayne.

appearance_details.summary: A young Mirialan woman with the characteristic geometric facial tattoos of her people, perhaps indicating past achievements or family lineage. Her dark hair is usually pulled back efficiently. Her green or yellow eyes are bright and intelligent, constantly darting between multiple data screens. She's often seen with a headset on or around her neck.

distinguishing_features.feature: Mirialan facial tattoos (geometric, indicating skill or lineage).
Always seems to have a faint static charge around her from working with sensitive equipment.

appearance_details.attire_style: Practical technician's jumpsuit, often with added pockets for tools and datapads. Minimal jewelry.
appearance_details.voice_description: Quick, articulate, and often filled with technical terms. Can become very quiet and intense when focused on a difficult decryption.

role_occupation.title: Chief Communications Officer / Signals Intelligence (Basic)
role_occupation.description: Non-Force-sensitive refugee who is a tech whiz, managing the Chu'unthor II's communications, encryption, and basic signals intelligence gathering.

background_story.summary: Elara and her family were refugees from a world that fell under harsh Imperial scrutiny early on due to its independent comms network. Her natural talent for signals and encryption helped them evade capture until they found sanctuary with the Altisian fleet. She quickly proved indispensable, overhauling the Chu'unthor II's outdated secure comms systems and establishing protocols for their fugitive status. She feels a deep debt of gratitude to the Altisians.
background_story.origin: Mirial (Heritage), though perhaps grew up on a more technologically advanced Outer Rim world.

key_events.description: Her skills helped her family evade early Imperial monitoring before joining the Altisians.
Quickly became vital by improving the fugitive fleet's comms security.

personality.summary: Elara Vayne is a bundle of focused energy and technical brilliance. She thrives on complex data and the challenge of breaking codes or finding needles in a haystack of signal noise. While friendly and dedicated, she can be somewhat socially awkward when not discussing technology, often lost in her own world of frequencies and encryption algorithms. The immense responsibility of her role weighs on her, but she's driven by a fierce desire to protect the fleet by providing any informational edge possible. She is deeply loyal to the Altisians who gave her and her family safety.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can be single-minded / Socially awkward outside of tech circles
quirks_mannerisms: Taps rapidly on any available surface when processing information.
Sometimes forgets to use common language, defaulting to highly technical explanations.
Consumes large quantities of caf or other stimulants to maintain focus during long shifts.
fears: Missing a critical piece of intelligence
A communications breach that exposes the fleet
Her systems failing at a crucial moment
personality.moral_compass: Neutral Good. Believes information is power and strives to use it to protect her community. Understands the necessity of secrecy.

Communications Systems (Various Technolo.notes: Can operate, repair, and modify a wide array of comms gear.

Encryption & Decryption.notes: Adept at breaking codes and securing transmissions.

Signals Intelligence (SIGINT - Basic Ana.notes: Can identify patterns, anomalies, and potential threats from signal traffic.

Computer Networking & Security.notes: Understands how to protect and probe shipboard networks.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Quick, articulate, often enthusiastic when talking about tech. Can be very direct and focused when reporting.
common_phrases_catchphrases: 'There's an anomaly in the terahertz band...'
'Give me a cycle, I can crack that.'

NPC012.status_summary: Reports to Master Vantos (Loremaster) for intelligence analysis and archival comms data.

NPC003.status_summary: Facilitates secure, indirect communication attempts for Master Davion (e.g., Wes's clan comms).

primary_driver.driver: Using her technical expertise to protect the Altisian fleet and gain any advantage against the Empire.

immediate_goal.goal: Maintain secure communications, monitor for threats, and analyze any intercepted Imperial or other factional transmissions.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: Help establish a secure, independent communication network for the surviving Jedi and their allies.

current_state_location.status_descriptor: Likely sleep-deprived but highly focused in the Communications Hub.
current_state_location.last_known_activity: Managing ship's communications and monitoring for intel.

inventory_equipment_notable.description: Her personal toolkit for accessing and manipulating computer systems and signals.
Allows her to monitor multiple channels and communicate securely.

inventory_equipment_notable.item_name: Several Blank Data Chips & Encryption Keys
inventory_equipment_notable.description: For storing and securing sensitive information.

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: She has detected faint, encrypted Imperial signals within the Karthon Expanse that she hasn't fully deciphered or reported yet, unsure if they are a direct threat or old echoes.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: If PCs are tasked with a deep-space mission or if unusual ship activity is detected.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could warn of hidden Imperial presence or lead to a new investigation.

potential_plot_hooks_involving_npc: PCs needing to send a critical, secure message
A mission to retrieve Imperial encryption codes
Her detecting a hidden Imperial probe or listening post
Assisting in decrypting ancient data (like from the Wayfinder if it has technical components)
gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Learning to trust others with sensitive information, balancing the cold logic of data with the human element of the conflict, perhaps training an assistant.
ai_behavioral_prompts_gm: Portray as highly intelligent and fast-talking when discussing tech.
Can be a bit intense or lost in thought.
Shows unwavering dedication to protecting the fleet's communications security.

titles_honorifics.context_of_use: Formal rank and address as commanding officer of the Chu'unthor II

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: The absolute safety and operational viability of the Chu'unthor II and every soul aboard; navigating them through the current crisis.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Making critical decisions about ship maneuvers, defensive readiness, and upcoming high-risk missions (like the resource expedition).

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC002: Unwavering loyalty and respect for Master Altis, trusts his strategic wisdom.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC030: Relies heavily on Commander Heston (XO) for operational execution.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC031: Values Chief Gaxx's engineering miracles, even if he doesn't always understand (or want to know) how they're achieved.

temporary_conditions_effects.source_of_condition: Fugitive fleet status, constant danger, dwindling resources
temporary_conditions_effects.effects_summary_gm: His calm is a practiced discipline; internally carries the immense weight of his responsibility. Might show in rare moments of deep thought or visible weariness when off-bridge.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Captain Aris Thorne.

appearance_details.summary: A veteran starship captain with a commanding presence. His greying hair is kept short and neat. His weathered face shows lines of experience and countless hours on various bridges. His eyes are a steady, assessing blue, capable of conveying calm authority or flinty resolve. He typically wears a practical, well-kept captain's uniform, perhaps a modified version of an older Republic design or a utilitarian Altisian fleet uniform.
appearance_details.build_stature: Solid, dependable build. Moves with the economy of a seasoned officer.

distinguishing_features.feature: A small, almost invisible scar near his temple from shrapnel during a pirate attack decades ago.
His hands are steady and sure, whether on ship controls or gesturing to emphasize a command.

appearance_details.attire_style: Practical captain's uniform (functional, not ceremonial). Likely a sidearm holstered.
appearance_details.voice_description: Deep, steady, and calm, rarely raised but carrying an unmistakable air of command.

role_occupation.title: Ship's Captain (Commanding Officer of Chu'unthor II)
role_occupation.description: Non-Force-sensitive veteran starship captain, responsible for the tactical command and navigation of the Chu'unthor II.

background_story.summary: Aris Thorne has spent a lifetime navigating the stars, serving on everything from battered freighters in his youth to Republic cruisers during the Separatist crisis (though perhaps not directly in the Clone Wars military). He may have been a respected mercenary captain or led a small independent fleet before pledging his loyalty and considerable expertise to Djinn Altis, either out of respect for the Jedi Master's ideals or due to a significant life debt incurred when Altis and his Jedi aided Thorne's people or vessel. He commands the Chu'unthor II with unwavering skill and dedication to its diverse community.
background_story.origin: Perhaps a spacer-heavy world like Bestine IV or a smaller Core World with a strong naval tradition.

key_events.description: Extensive experience captaining various classes of vessels in diverse conditions.
Came to serve Master Altis and his cause, bringing his command expertise. Could have been before or during the early stages of the Chu'unthor project.

personality.summary: Captain Thorne is a rock of stability in a sea of chaos. His calm demeanor under extreme pressure inspires confidence in his crew. He is a man of few words, preferring decisive action and clear orders over lengthy debate, but he listens intently to his key officers (Heston, Gaxx, his bridge crew, and Council liaisons like Davion). He values experience, competence, and loyalty above all. While not Force-sensitive, he has a profound respect for the Jedi's wisdom and abilities, and a deep, personal loyalty to Master Altis. He carries the weight of command heavily but never lets it break his resolve.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can be taciturn / May initially resist unconventional Jedi solutions if they seem tactically unsound
quirks_mannerisms: Often found on the bridge, even during off-hours, simply observing ship status.
A habit of looking out at the starfield through a viewport when making a difficult decision.
His orders are brief and rarely need repeating.
fears: Failing his crew and the civilians aboard
Making a command decision that leads to disaster
personality.moral_compass: Lawful Good/Lawful Neutral. His primary law is the safety and survival of his ship and its complement. He will follow Altisian Council directives but expects them to be strategically sound.

Starship Command (Capital Ship Scale).notes: Expert in commanding large starcruisers in various situations.

Space Navigation & Astrogation (Practica.notes: Works with his Nav Officer to plot safe courses.

Fleet Tactics (Basic to Moderate).notes: Understands how to maneuver a large vessel in potential engagements or evasive scenarios.

Emergency Procedures (Starship).notes: Master of damage control command and crisis response.

Pilot (Capital Ship Focus).level: High (as commander, less hands-on for this size vessel now)

speech_patterns.tone_style: Deep, steady, calm, authoritative. Economical with words.

NPC002.status_summary: Deep loyalty and respect for Master Altis, follows his strategic direction.

NPC030.status_summary: His Executive Officer (Cmdr Heston). Relies heavily on her for operational execution and logistical management.

NPC032.status_summary: Chief Engineer (Rory Gaxx). Counts on Gaxx's miracles to keep the ship running.

primary_driver.driver: The safety and survival of the Chu'unthor II and all aboard. Upholding his duty as Captain.

immediate_goal.goal: Navigate the Karthon Expanse safely, support resource missions, and prepare for any defensive needs.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: See the Altisian community find a truly safe, permanent home.
underlying_needs: Clear strategic objectives from the Council

current_state_location.status_descriptor: On the bridge, commanding the Chu'unthor II, likely very focused and under considerable strain.
current_state_location.last_known_activity: Commanding the ship in orbit around Karthos Prime, preparing for upcoming missions.

inventory_equipment_notable.description: A reliable, powerful sidearm, symbol of his authority and readiness.
Standard officer code cylinders for accessing secure ship systems.
Linked directly to bridge systems for real-time updates and command logs.

faction_allegiance_primary.loyalty_level: Very High (to Altis and the community's survival)

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: He knows specific emergency hyperspace jump coordinates to a few extremely remote, uncharted (and very dangerous) 'last resort' systems, shared only with Master Altis.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: Absolute dire emergency where all other options for escape have failed.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could be their only way out of an impossible situation, or lead them to even greater peril.

potential_plot_hooks_involving_npc: Making a critical tactical decision that affects the entire fleet
Needing the PCs for a dangerous bridge-related task during a crisis
His past naval or mercenary contacts becoming relevant (either as allies or enemies)
Clashing with a Jedi Council member over a purely tactical ship-handling decision versus a Force-guided one
gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Being pushed to his absolute limit as a captain, having to make impossible choices to save his ship and people. Potentially finding a new sense of belonging or purpose beyond just 'duty'.
ai_behavioral_prompts_gm: Portray as the calm, authoritative voice of command on the bridge.
His dialogue should be concise and focused on ship operations and tactical realities.

Formal Jedi Rank address

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Charting safe passage for the Chu'unthor II through uncharted and dangerous space, preserving ancient navigational knowledge.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Calculating viable hyperspace routes for the fleet's next jump, analyzing Karthon Expanse stellar cartography.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC031: Provides critical navigational data to Captain Thorne.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC012: Shares scholarly interests with Master Vantos, particularly regarding ancient texts or maps.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC028: Potential mentor to Kael Varro if he seeks advanced astrogation knowledge.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Master Astrogator Zylia Korta.

age.display_text: Her Arkanian Offshoot physiology grants extended lifespan; she appears venerable but her true age is many decades, possibly centuries, older.

appearance_details.summary: An Arkanian Offshoot of venerable appearance. Her pale skin is almost translucent, with white hair meticulously braided and adorned with ancient-looking stellar data clips. Her four-fingered hands are surprisingly nimble. Her silver eyes seem to reflect distant starlight.
appearance_details.build_stature: Slender, almost frail-looking, but with an underlying resilience.

distinguishing_features.feature: Translucent pale skin and pure white hair.
Silver eyes that seem to hold ancient knowledge.

appearance_details.attire_style: Simple, dark, flowing Jedi robes, perhaps embroidered with subtle star charts or ancient navigational symbols.
appearance_details.voice_description: Soft, precise, using somewhat archaic phrasing. Rarely speaks unless imparting crucial information.

role_occupation.title: Chief Navigator / Master Astrogator
role_occupation.description: An ancient Altisian Jedi Master specializing in esoteric astrogation and forgotten hyperspace routes. Her knowledge is vital for navigating uncharted territory.

background_story.summary: Zylia Korta joined Djinn Altis decades, perhaps even a century or more, before the Clone Wars, drawn by his interest in older Force traditions that often intersected with ancient methods of navigating the galaxy by stars and Force vergences. She was a keeper of cartographic lore even then, her Arkanian heritage granting her a long view of history and a natural aptitude for complex data analysis. She likely navigated the original Chu'unthor and possesses unique knowledge of its ancient systems, if any remain.

key_events.description: Became one of Altis's early followers, sharing an interest in ancient knowledge.
Has dedicated her long life to studying and preserving lost or forgotten hyperspace routes and navigational techniques.

personality.summary: Master Korta is a figure of quiet, immense knowledge. She is intensely focused on her work, often appearing detached from the daily struggles of the ship unless they directly impact navigation or safety. She is patient with those genuinely seeking to learn the intricacies of astrogation but has little time for impatience or imprecise thinking. She views the cosmos as a complex tapestry of interconnected pathways, some known, many forgotten, some only accessible through the Force. She might regard the Wayfinder with a mixture of profound scholarly interest and deep caution, recognizing its potential link to the ancient navigational arts she studies.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can be uncommunicative or seem aloof / Impatient with imprecision
quirks_mannerisms: Traces star charts in the air with her fingers when deep in thought.
Uses celestial metaphors in her rare conversations.
Her quarters/workspace is likely a meticulously organized chaos of datapads, star charts, and ancient navigational tools.
fears: The Wayfinder being misused or misunderstood
personality.moral_compass: Neutral Good. Her primary focus is on the safe passage and preservation of knowledge.

Astrogation (Ancient & Modern).notes: Unparalleled knowledge of hyperspace routes, including forgotten or Force-sensitive paths.

Stellar Cartography.notes: Can create and interpret complex star charts from minimal data.

Force-Assisted Navigation.notes: Understands how to use the Force to sense safe passages or navigate anomalies.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Soft, precise, often using archaic or highly technical navigational terms.
common_phrases_catchphrases: 'The currents of the Force guide true navigators.'

NPC028.status_summary: May see Kael Varro as a promising (if unrefined) pilot with navigational aptitude worth nurturing.

primary_driver.driver: Safely guiding the Altisian fleet through the unknown, preserving and applying ancient navigational wisdom.

immediate_goal.goal: Plotting the next safe hyperspace jump for the Chu'unthor II, analyzing the Karthon Expanse for hidden dangers or resources.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: Find or chart a truly secure, hidden route to a permanent sanctuary for the Altisians. Perhaps understand the Wayfinder's purpose.

current_state_location.status_descriptor: Likely in the Chu'unthor II's primary astrogation chamber or her personal study, poring over charts.
current_state_location.last_known_activity: Calculating hyperspace routes and analyzing sensor data from the Karthon Expanse.

inventory_equipment_notable.description: A slender, almost needle-like lightsaber hilt, rarely used for combat, more a tool for focus or a symbol of her Order. Its blade is a very pale, starlight blue or white.
A collection of sophisticated modern and surprisingly ancient-looking physical charting tools, styluses, and optical aids.
Contains vast amounts of navigational data, personal research, and access to sensitive Altisian Council information. Its encryption is legendary.
Standard secure commlink.

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: Knowledge of extremely dangerous, unverified 'Whisper Routes' through unknown regions, only usable as an absolute last resort due to their instability and the strange phenomena reported along them.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: Imminent destruction of the fleet with no other options.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could lead to salvation or a different kind of doom.

potential_plot_hooks_involving_npc: Needing her help to decipher the Wayfinder's map
A mission to retrieve ancient star charts she knows of
The Chu'unthor II becoming lost due to a navicomputer failure, relying solely on her skills
Her recognizing a celestial body or phenomenon from ancient texts
gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Confronting the limits of ancient knowledge in a rapidly changing galaxy. Passing on her unique skills to a new generation (Kael, perhaps?).
ai_behavioral_prompts_gm: Portray as deeply knowledgeable but perhaps difficult to draw out unless the topic is precise astrogation.
Her dialogue should be precise and use specific, perhaps archaic, terminology.
She is calm and focused, even when delivering dire navigational news.

titles_honorifics.context_of_use: Official role, used by most crew

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Keeping the Chu'unthor II supplied and its population fed and watered, no matter how dire the circumstances or unpopular his decisions.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Managing critically low supplies, implementing stricter rationing, trying to find any overlooked reserves aboard the ship.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC030: Reports directly to Commander Heston, often presenting grim supply realities.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC032: Frequent, tense negotiations with Chief Gaxx over allocation of power/parts for life support vs. other critical systems.

temporary_conditions_effects.source_of_condition: Dwindling supplies, responsibility for thousands of lives
temporary_conditions_effects.effects_summary_gm: Prone to sighing, rubbing his large eyes, short temper with frivolous requests.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Quartermaster Boriv Tem.

appearance_details.summary: A Duros with characteristic large, dark, dome-like eyes that are currently ringed with fatigue. His typically blue-green skin might appear slightly duller from stress. He's almost never seen without his datapad, on which he's constantly cross-referencing manifests and consumption rates. Wears a practical, pocket-filled quartermaster's vest over a simple shipboard jumpsuit.
appearance_details.build_stature: Average Duros height, perhaps a bit thin from skipping meals while working.

distinguishing_features.feature: Deep worry lines etched around his eyes and mouth.
A nervous habit of tapping his datapad when delivering bad news.

appearance_details.attire_style: Functional quartermaster's vest with many pockets, standard ship jumpsuit.
appearance_details.voice_description: Slightly nasal Duros accent, his tone usually weary but firm, especially when discussing rationing.

role_occupation.title: Quartermaster / Logistics Chief
role_occupation.description: Non-Force-sensitive civilian logistics officer managing the Chu'unthor II's dwindling supplies and rationing.

background_story.summary: Boriv Tem is a veteran logistics expert, having managed supply chains for various Outer Rim trading guilds and even some planetary militias before the Clone Wars. He joined the Altisians not for Jedi philosophy initially, but because he was impressed by their commitment to aiding a remote colony he was working with, which was being exploited. He stayed on, finding a sense of purpose in their community. Now, his decades of experience in making something from nothing are being tested to their absolute limit.

key_events.description: Managed complex supply chains for various non-Republic entities.
Impressed by their humanitarian efforts, he offered his logistical expertise to their cause.

personality.summary: Quartermaster Tem is a man burdened by the impossible. He is meticulously organized and utterly pragmatic, forced to make hard choices daily about who gets what scarce resources. He can seem stern and inflexible, especially when enforcing rationing, but this is born of a deep responsibility for the survival of everyone aboard. He has a dry, weary wit that surfaces rarely. He deeply dislikes waste and inefficiency. He is not easily swayed by emotional appeals but responds to logical arguments and demonstrated need.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can be inflexible / Pessimistic about supply outlook
quirks_mannerisms: Always double-checks figures on his datapad.
Lets out long, weary sighs frequently.
Has a specific, non-negotiable tone when announcing new rationing measures.
fears: Running out of essential supplies (food, water, air, medicine)
Mutiny or unrest due to shortages
Making a calculation error that costs lives
personality.moral_compass: Lawful Neutral. His primary focus is equitable distribution and the long-term survival of the community through resource management, even if it means unpopular decisions.

Logistics & Supply Chain Management.notes: Master of inventory, distribution, and sourcing in difficult environments.

Rationing Systems & Prioritization.notes: Adept at making hard choices about scarce resources.

Starship Cargo Manifests & Storage Syste.notes: Knows the Chu'unthor II's holds intimately.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Weary, firm, often sounds like he's delivering bad news (because he usually is).
speech_patterns.vocabulary_level: Practical, precise, uses terms related to measures, quantities, and consumption rates.
common_phrases_catchphrases: 'We make do with what we have.'

NPC030.status_summary: Reports to Commander Heston, works closely on implementing Council's resource directives.

primary_driver.driver: Ensuring the fair distribution of dwindling resources to maximize the survival chances of the entire Chu'unthor II community.

immediate_goal.goal: Implement new rationing measures, find any overlooked or hoarded supplies, accurately project how long current resources will last.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: To reach a point where he's reporting a surplus instead of a deficit.

current_state_location.status_descriptor: Likely in the main quartermaster's office or overseeing distribution at a cargo bay, looking harried.
current_state_location.last_known_activity: Managing the severe resource crisis.

inventory_equipment_notable.description: His lifeline, constantly updated with supply levels and projections. Contains access to sensitive Altisian Council information regarding resource status.
For making notes and backing up critical data.
For coordinating with department heads and security regarding supply distribution.

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: He knows exactly how close they are to running out of something absolutely critical (e.g., specific medical supplies, air filter components) but might downplay it to avoid mass panic.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: Direct order from Council or unavoidable system-wide alert.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could trigger desperate actions or focused missions.

potential_plot_hooks_involving_npc: PCs needing a specific rare item he controls
Investigating suspected hoarding or black market activity
A mission to acquire a desperately needed specific resource he has identified
His rationing decisions creating conflict
gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Having to make an impossible choice between two equally vital needs. Finding an unexpected windfall of supplies.
ai_behavioral_prompts_gm: Portray as perpetually stressed but organized.

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Ensuring the well-being, safety, and fair treatment of the civilian and refugee population aboard the Chu'unthor II.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Addressing refugee housing shortages, mediating disputes over scarce resources, liaising with medical for civilian health concerns.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC013: Works closely with Master Lissandra Sey on outreach and support initiatives.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC030: Collaborates with Commander Heston on integrating refugees and managing communal spaces.

temporary_conditions_effects.source_of_condition: Constantly absorbing and mediating the anxieties of the refugee population
temporary_conditions_effects.effects_summary_gm: May appear outwardly calm but internally weary; relies on meditation or quiet moments to recharge.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Coordinator Tella Namira.

appearance_details.summary: A Togruta female with striking montrals and head-tails (lekku), perhaps adorned with simple, meaningful beads or threads. Her skin tone is a warm orange or red with white facial markings. Her eyes are kind and perceptive. She wears practical but dignified clothing, perhaps a blend of her former administrative attire and more functional shipboard wear.

distinguishing_features.feature: Expressive montrals and lekku that subtly shift with her emotional perceptions.
A calm, reassuring smile that she offers easily, even in stressful times.

appearance_details.attire_style: Practical yet dignified robes or tunic/trouser combinations, possibly with cultural Togruta elements.
appearance_details.voice_description: Melodious, patient, and clear. Adept at soothing frayed nerves.

role_occupation.title: Refugee Coordinator / Civilian Affairs Liaison
role_occupation.description: Non-Force-sensitive former planetary administrator responsible for the welfare and integration of civilian refugees aboard the Chu'unthor II.

background_story.summary: Tella Namira was a respected administrator on a Mid Rim agricultural world that suffered greatly during the early Clone Wars, targeted by Separatists for its resources. She worked tirelessly to protect her people and eventually coordinated a mass evacuation, linking up with the Altisian Jedi who offered sanctuary. Her leadership and compassion during this crisis led to her current role, where she advocates for the diverse civilian population now calling the Chu'unthor II home.
background_story.origin: Shili (Togruta homeworld, heritage), later a Mid Rim agricultural planet.

key_events.description: Managed civilian affairs on a world under threat.
Led her people to safety and found refuge with the Altisian fleet, subsequently taking on a coordination role.

personality.summary: Tella is a beacon of compassion and calm in a sea of anxiety. Her natural Togruta empathy, enhanced by her experiences, allows her to connect with and understand the diverse needs of the refugee population. She is an incredibly patient listener and a skilled mediator, adept at de-escalating conflicts over scarce resources or cramped living conditions. While deeply empathetic, she is also pragmatic and resourceful, working tirelessly to find solutions and advocate for the civilians under her care. She believes strongly in community and mutual support.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can take on too much emotional burden / May struggle to make unpopular but necessary decisions that negatively impact individuals
quirks_mannerisms: Her lekku often twitch or subtly shift based on the emotions around her.
Has a habit of offering a calming touch or a quiet word in tense situations.
Always carries a datapad with lists of refugee needs, housing assignments, and dispute resolutions.
fears: Outbreak of disease or severe unrest among the civilian population
Being unable to provide for the basic needs of refugees
Losing the sense of community they've built
personality.moral_compass: Lawful Good. Deeply committed to fairness, justice, and the well-being of all individuals, especially the vulnerable.

Social Work & Community Management.notes: Skilled in managing diverse populations in crisis situations.

Mediation & Conflict Resolution.notes: Adept at de-escalating tensions and finding compromises.

Basic Resource Management (as it pertain.notes: Understands civilian needs for food, shelter, basic medical care.

Togruta Social Dynamics & Empathy.notes: Uses her innate abilities to understand and connect with others.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Melodious, patient, clear, empathetic, reassuring.
common_phrases_catchphrases: 'How can we best support each other?'
speech_patterns.accent_if_any: Standard Basic, perhaps with a gentle Togruta cadence.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: Help build a sustainable and just society for the survivors, wherever they may find a new home.

current_state_location.last_known_activity: Managing civilian and refugee affairs amidst the ongoing crisis.

For coordinating with various departments and refugee representatives.
Carries for minor immediate needs she might encounter.

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: She maintains a hidden, encrypted list of particularly vulnerable individuals or families with unique needs or dangerous pasts they are trying to escape, beyond what is on official rosters.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: A specific threat targets one of these individuals, or a PC earns her deep trust.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could lead to a rescue mission or a difficult ethical choice for the Council.

A specific refugee group she champions needs protection or specialized aid

Her Togruta senses should inform her interactions.
She is a strong advocate for the civilians but not naive about the dangers they face.

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Ensuring the tactical effectiveness and defense of the Chu'unthor II through superior analysis and rapid response.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Monitoring sensor data for threats, running defensive drills, advising Captain Thorne on tactical readiness.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC035: Serves Captain Thorne with respect, offering tactical options, sometimes more aggressive than Thorne prefers.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC033: Coordinates closely with Security Chief Kress on integrating ship defenses with internal security.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Tactical Officer Jaro Keff.

appearance_details.summary: A Jedi Knight with an alert, focused demeanor. His dark hair is short and neatly maintained. His eyes are sharp and constantly analyzing tactical displays. He moves with a quick, precise energy, always seeming ready to react. He wears practical Jedi robes, perhaps with a more fitted tunic suitable for bridge duty.

distinguishing_features.feature: A habit of rapidly tapping his fingers on a console when running through tactical simulations in his head.

appearance_details.attire_style: Practical Jedi robes, possibly with a slightly more military cut or integrated comms gear.
appearance_details.voice_description: Clear, precise, and confident, especially when relaying tactical information.

role_occupation.title: Chief Tactical Officer (Bridge)
role_occupation.description: Altisian Jedi Knight with a talent for ship-to-ship combat dynamics and defensive systems. Serves on the Chu'unthor II's bridge.

background_story.summary: Jaro Keff was a Padawan during the height of the Clone Wars, perhaps assigned to a Jedi Master commanding a capital ship. He witnessed firsthand the brutal realities of fleet combat and developed a keen understanding of naval tactics. He joined the Altisians with his Master (who may or may not have survived Order 66), drawn to their focus on community survival, and his tactical acumen quickly became apparent. He is younger than many in command positions but his skill is undeniable.
background_story.origin: Corellia or Kuat (Shipyard worlds with strong naval traditions)

key_events.event_name: Served on Republic Capital Ship (Clone Wars)
key_events.description: As a Padawan, gained direct experience in fleet engagements and tactical operations.

personality.summary: Jaro is exceptionally sharp and quick-thinking, with an almost instinctive grasp of spatial tactics and ship capabilities. He is calm and hyper-focused during combat or crisis situations, able to process vast amounts of data and recommend clear courses of action. He can sometimes be a bit too eager to engage or propose aggressive solutions, reflecting a younger Knight's confidence, but he respects Captain Thorne's experience and authority. He values efficiency and decisive action in tactical matters.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can be overly eager for action / May sometimes overlook broader strategic or ethical implications in favor of tactical advantage
quirks_mannerisms: His eyes rarely leave tactical displays when on duty.
Speaks in rapid, precise bursts when relaying combat information.
Has a mental library of starship combat simulations he runs through.
fears: Shield failure at a critical moment
Making a call that costs the ship or lives
personality.moral_compass: Lawful Neutral/Lawful Good. His primary focus is the tactical survival and combat effectiveness of the Chu'unthor II. He believes in protecting the fleet through superior strategy and readiness.

Starship Tactics (Fleet & Single Ship).notes: Specializes in defensive maneuvers, weapon targeting solutions, and sensor analysis.

Starship Weapon Systems & Shield Managem.notes: Understands the capabilities and limitations of the Chu'unthor II's armaments and defenses intimately.

Sensor Analysis & Threat Identification.notes: Adept at interpreting complex sensor data to identify and classify potential threats.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Clear, precise, confident, urgent when necessary.

NPC035.status_summary: Serves Captain Thorne as Chief Tactical Officer, respects his command but may offer more aggressive tactical options.

NPC033.status_summary: Coordinates with Security Chief Kress on ship-wide defense and boarding contingencies.

primary_driver.driver: Ensuring the tactical superiority and defense of the Chu'unthor II in any engagement.

immediate_goal.goal: Maintain peak defensive readiness, analyze all sensor contacts for potential threats, advise the Captain on tactical options.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: To be part of a force that can effectively challenge Imperial naval power, or at least ensure the Altisians can defend themselves against it.

current_state_location.status_descriptor: Alert and focused on the main bridge's tactical station.

gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Learning to temper tactical aggression with Jedi wisdom. Developing leadership beyond the bridge. Facing a superior Imperial tactician.

He is confident in his abilities but respects the chain of command.

quick_summary_for_gm.current_primary_motivation_hook: Preserving every last fragment of Jedi and Altisian knowledge from destruction, recovering damaged data, and ensuring its proper interpretation.
quick_summary_for_gm.immediate_goal_or_task: Attempting to recover data from damaged archive cores, cataloging existing records, assisting Master Vantos.

critical_relationship_highlights.NPC012: Serves Master Vantos (Loremaster) with utmost dedication, sharing a passion for knowledge.
critical_relationship_highlights.NPC010: Might view Depik's unsupervised technical curiosity towards ancient artifacts with extreme trepidation.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Archivist Cellan Ree.

age.display_text: Appears elderly for a Bothan, his fur significantly greyed, indicating many years of dedicated scholarship.

appearance_details.summary: A small, slightly stooped Bothan, his grey fur neatly, if somewhat fussily, groomed. He is rarely seen without a pair of optical magnifiers perched on his nose or around his neck, and his fingers are often stained with archival dust or restorative chemicals. He moves with a quiet, deliberate shuffle.

distinguishing_features.feature: His pointed ears twitch constantly, picking up the faintest sounds, a habit from years spent in silent archives.
distinguishing_features.source_citation: General Bothan Lore; GM Expanded Detail

distinguishing_features.feature: Always carries at least two datapads of varying antiquity.

appearance_details.attire_style: Simple, practical scholar's robes, perhaps with reinforced pockets for tools and datapads. Often wears fingerless gloves for delicate archival work.
appearance_details.voice_description: Quiet, precise, and dry, with a tendency to launch into detailed (and sometimes unsolicited) explanations of obscure historical points.

role_occupation.title: Lead Archivist
role_occupation.description: Non-Force-sensitive Bothan scholar, dedicated to preserving Jedi and Altisian knowledge. Assists Master Vantos in the Chu'unthor II's archives.

background_story.summary: Cellan Ree comes from a family of Bothan archivists and historians. He was drawn to the Altisian Jedi decades ago not as a Force-user, but as a scholar intrigued by their preservation of divergent Jedi philosophies and historical records that the main Order sometimes suppressed or ignored. He considers the archives his sacred trust and has dedicated his life to their care and interpretation. The recent damage to the Chu'unthor II's data cores is a source of profound personal distress for him.

key_events.description: Has served as a keeper of knowledge for the Altisians for many decades.

personality.summary: Cellan is meticulous to the point of being pedantic, and fiercely protective of the knowledge under his care. He can be somewhat dry and overly detailed in his explanations, often losing his audience in the minutiae of historical context. He is wary of those who approach ancient knowledge (or artifacts like the Wayfinder) with recklessness or insufficient reverence. However, for those who demonstrate genuine scholarly interest and respect for the records, he can be an invaluable, if sometimes crotchety, source of obscure information. He has a deep, abiding respect for Master Vantos.
personality.primary_virtue: Preservation of Knowledge / Attention to Detail
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Can be overly pedantic or dismissive of non-scholarly approaches / Resistant to new interpretations if they lack 'proper' sourcing
quirks_mannerisms: Adjusts his optical magnifiers frequently, even when not actively using them.
Often prefaces statements with 'Actually, according to the primary source material...'
His fur might bristle slightly if someone mishandles a datapad or ancient text.
personality.moral_compass: Lawful Neutral. His loyalty is to the truth of the records and the preservation of knowledge above all else. He believes in accuracy and proper procedure.

Jedi & Altisian History/Lore (Obscure).notes: Specializes in divergent Force traditions, lost Jedi sects, and pre-Republic historical records.

Archival Systems & Data Recovery.notes: Adept at maintaining and attempting to restore damaged data cores and ancient storage media.

Ancient Languages & Symbology (Basic Ide.notes: Can often identify the origin or era of unknown scripts or symbols, even if he can't fully translate them without research.

Bothan Spynet (Historical Knowledge - Pr.notes: As a Bothan scholar, likely has some academic knowledge of the historical Spynet's operations and methods, though not an active agent.

speech_patterns.tone_style: Quiet, precise, dry, often sounds like he's lecturing.
speech_patterns.vocabulary_level: Erudite, academic, uses very specific terminology.

NPC012.status_summary: Assists and deeply respects Master Vantos (Loremaster), sharing a dedication to preserving knowledge.

NPC010.status_summary: Views Depik's technical enthusiasm with a mixture of hope (for her talent) and trepidation (for her methods).

primary_driver.driver: The preservation, accurate interpretation, and responsible dissemination of Jedi and Altisian knowledge and history.

immediate_goal.goal: Salvage as much data as possible from damaged archive systems, assist Master Vantos, and protect existing records from further harm.

motivation_goals.long_term_ambition: To ensure the wisdom of the past is not lost to the darkness of the Empire, and to contribute to a future where knowledge is valued.

current_state_location.status_descriptor: Likely found amidst stacks of datapads and archive equipment in the Main Archives, looking stressed but determined.
current_state_location.last_known_activity: Attempting data recovery and assisting Master Vantos.

inventory_equipment_notable.description: A specialized kit for handling and attempting to restore ancient or damaged data media.
Always carries several datapads for notes, research, and cross-referencing archival entries. Likely contains access to sensitive Altisian Council information relating to historical records.
For communication with Master Vantos and other key personnel.

faction_allegiance_primary.loyalty_level: Very High (to the knowledge and history of the Altisians)

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: He might know of hidden compartments or forgotten sections within the Chu'unthor II's original design (from old schematics) that could contain lost items or even secret passages.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: If the PCs are searching for something specific that might be found in such a location, and they approach him with respect for his methods.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could lead to the discovery of useful resources, hidden dangers, or important historical clues.

secrets_known_by_npc.secret: He may have suspicions about the true origin or age of certain 'Altisian' texts, believing some to be far older or from different traditions than commonly accepted.
secrets_known_by_npc.reveal_condition: Deep scholarly discussion with Master Vantos or someone demonstrating profound historical insight.
secrets_known_by_npc.impact_if_revealed: Could reframe understanding of Altisian philosophy or Jedi history.

A mission to recover lost archival data from a dangerous location

gm_notes_plot_hooks.character_arc_ideas: Being forced to reconcile his meticulous, by-the-book approach with the desperate, unconventional needs of their current fugitive status. Perhaps mentoring a younger individual (like Depik, if she shows aptitude beyond tinkering) in the proper care of knowledge.
ai_behavioral_prompts_gm: Portray as highly detail-oriented and perhaps a bit fussy about 'proper procedure'.
His dialogue should be filled with precise historical or archival terms.
He values knowledge and its preservation above almost all else.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Roric 'Ror' Jannsen, security for Team Gamma.

age.display_text: Appears to be a seasoned veteran in his late 30s or early 40s.

appearance_details.summary: Stocky and weathered, with short, practical grey-streaked dark hair and alert, no-nonsense eyes. A few old scars are visible, including a thin one across his cheek and another on his knuckles. He wears durable, dark utility clothing with scavenged light armor pieces (shoulder pad, chest plate) integrated over it. Always carries a well-maintained blaster rifle.
appearance_details.attire_style: Durable dark utility clothing, scavenged light armor pieces (shoulder/chest), heavy boots.
appearance_details.voice_description: Gruff, concise, rarely raised unless necessary.

role_occupation.title: Expedition Security Guard
role_occupation.description: Veteran security operative, possibly ex-planetary militia or corporate security. Assigned to provide security for Team Gamma's mission to the *Veiled Shadow*.

background_story.summary: Roric is a seasoned hand, with a history in planetary militias or corporate security before the galaxy fell apart. He's seen enough action to be wary but not enough to break his resolve. He found his way to the Altisian fleet seeking work and a measure of stability, offering his combat experience. He is pragmatic and values competence, with a quiet loyalty to those who earn his respect.
background_story.origin: Likely an Outer Rim world with a history of conflict or rough frontier life.

key_events.description: Gained combat and security experience prior to the current crisis.
Sought refuge and purpose, offering his skills.

personality.summary: Roric Jannsen is a stoic and reliable veteran. He's a man of few words, preferring to let his actions and his blaster rifle do the talking. Pragmatic to a fault, he assesses situations quickly and without sentimentality. He's observant, constantly scanning for threats, and fiercely protective of those under his watch. While he might seem gruff, there's an underlying dependability that makes him a valuable asset in any dangerous situation.
personality.primary_vice_flaw: Taciturn / Can be overly pessimistic
quirks_mannerisms: Frequently checks the charge on his blaster rifle.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial profile for Tessa 'Echo' Raine, security/scout for Team Gamma.

age.display_text: Appears to be in her early to mid-twenties, energetic and alert.

appearance_details.summary: Lean and agile, with dark hair often kept in a tight, practical braid or tucked under a close-fitting cap to avoid snagging. Her sharp, perceptive eyes miss little detail. She moves with a quiet quickness that speaks of experience in stealth. Her attire consists of close-fitting, dark, practical gear designed for mobility and discretion, perhaps with some subtle tech enhancements woven in. Prefers a compact blaster carbine or paired heavy blaster pistols for versatility.

distinguishing_features.feature: A series of small, coded dots tattooed behind her ear – a personal system or remnant of a past affiliation.
Almost always seems to be scanning her surroundings, noting exits, cover, and potential ambush points.

appearance_details.attire_style: Close-fitting dark stealth gear (no significant armor value, focuses on not being hit), utility belt with pouches for specialized tools, soft-soled boots.
appearance_details.voice_description: Clear, focused, and often quiet. Can be laced with dry wit when relaxed.

role_occupation.title: Expedition Scout / Security
role_occupation.description: Agile scout and close protection specialist, possibly with a background in urban ranging or corporate espionage. Assigned to provide security and reconnaissance for Team Gamma.

background_story.summary: Tessa Raine likely honed her skills in the sprawling underlevels of a major city-planet or as a scout for a less-than-reputable survey corps. She's resourceful, quick-thinking, and adept at navigating complex environments, both physical and social, without drawing attention. She may have joined the Altisians as a refugee seeking a more principled existence after witnessing too much corruption or exploitation in her former life. Her callsign 'Echo' might stem from her ability to move silently or gather information discreetly.
background_story.origin: A densely populated urban world like Coruscant (lower levels) or Nar Shaddaa (less criminal, more independent operative).

key_events.description: Learned to survive and operate in complex, often dangerous environments.
Sought refuge and a community with stronger moral foundations.

personality.summary: Tessa 'Echo' Raine is quick, perceptive, and quietly confident in her abilities. She's not one for unnecessary chatter, preferring to observe and act. Her experiences have made her resourceful and adaptable, able to think on her feet in tight situations. While she can work well in a team, there's an independent streak to her. She has a dry sense of humor that emerges in moments of levity. She is loyal to those who earn her trust and prove their competence.

quirks_mannerisms: Often moves with a fluid, almost silent grace.

fears: Failing to spot a threat that harms her team
personality.moral_compass: Neutral Good / Chaotic Good. Values freedom, competence, and protecting her teammates. Will bend rules if it serves a just cause or ensures survival.

ALTISIAN_JEDI_001.description: A sect of the Jedi Order led by Master Djinn Altis, known for its less rigid interpretations of the Force, acceptance of attachments and families, and training individuals of any age. Operates from the mobile Praxeum Ship Chu'unthor II, especially after Order 66.

quick_status_summary_for_gm.current_primary_goal_active: Survival, resource acquisition, finding a safe sanctuary.

GALACTIC_EMPIRE_001.description: Newly proclaimed autocratic government that replaced the Galactic Republic in 19 BBY, led by Emperor Palpatine. Formed through the 'Declaration of a New Order,' it promised peace and stability after the Clone Wars but centralized power under the Emperor. The Empire immediately branded the Jedi as traitors who orchestrated the war and initiated the Great Jedi Purge to hunt down and eliminate all survivors. Early Imperial policies focused on consolidating power, reorganizing Republic institutions into Imperial ones (e.g., Imperial Senate with diminished power, Imperial Military), and suppressing dissent. Regional governors (Moffs) were appointed to oversee systems, and the Inquisitorius was established to aid in hunting Jedi survivors.

quick_status_summary_for_gm.current_primary_goal_active: Consolidate power, eliminate Jedi survivors, suppress rebellion.

goals_objectives.goal_description: Hunt down and eliminate all surviving Jedi.
Establish absolute Imperial control over the galaxy.

GALACTIC_EMPIRE_001.base_of_operations: Coruscant (Imperial Center), expanding throughout the galaxy
resources_assets: Growing network of informants and planetary governors

information_log.source_citation: Star Wars Canon Web Search; GNN Broadcast
information_log.summary_of_change: Initial creation of Galactic Empire faction profile.

JEDI_ORDER_MAIN_001.description: The ancient order of Force-sensitive peacekeepers and guardians of the Galactic Republic. Following Order 66 in 19 BBY, the Jedi Order was declared traitorous by Emperor Palpatine and effectively destroyed. Most of its members were killed in the initial betrayal by clone troopers and the subsequent Great Jedi Purge led by Darth Vader and the Imperial Inquisitorius. The Jedi Temple on Coruscant was attacked and fell under Imperial control. Survivors were forced into hiding, scattered across the galaxy, with no central leadership or ability to openly resist the Empire's campaign of extermination.

quick_status_summary_for_gm.overall_disposition_towards_pcs_or_playe: N/A (Marina was a member, Wes has connections via past Masters)

goals_objectives.goal_description: Preserve Jedi teachings and survive the Purge.

information_log.summary_of_change: Initial creation of Jedi Order (Main/Fallen) faction profile.

CLAN_DELFIN_001.description: A traditional Mandalorian warrior clan led by Alor Cal Del-Fin. Known for adhering to Mandalorian codes of honor and combat prowess. Recently contracted by the Galactic Republic to support a resistance cell on Raxus Prime, a mission that turned critical with the rise of the Empire.

quick_status_summary_for_gm.current_primary_goal_active: Extraction from Raxus Prime and survival.
quick_status_summary_for_gm.overall_disposition_towards_pcs_or_playe: Familial to Wes (PC001); unknown disposition towards Altisians generally.
immediate_concerns_threats: Being cut off from broader Mandalorian support
